pages.title: Lose Niceness
pages.text: This chapter describes some ways to lose $(l:patchouli_jam:naughty_or_nice/niceness)Niceness$() so you get an idea what you should not do. This is not a complete list.

pages.title: Spawn Bosses
pages.text: Spawning the Ender-Dragon or a Wither will cost you some niceness.

pages.title: Hurting & Killing
pages.text: Hurting and killing entities makes you lose niceness. You'll lose much more niceness when you hurt babies.

pages.title: Starting Raids
pages.text: By starting a raid you'll significantly lose niceness. Be sure to win that raid so you can get more niceness back.
